Text:
how do i get this 2 work?
i downloaded it . extract it . install .
it checks for lisence then black screen 
galaxy s2

Works fine on my Rooted Ainol Novo Aurora 2.

You need to extract the data files you download. They were compressed and splitted. Use Winrar to extract them. After extraction, you will have a folder named com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftKRHM, inside this folder is one single obb file, nothing else.
-Copy the entire folder (not just the obb file) to sdcard/android/obb/
-Install the apk
-Extract the TB file, that should give you 2 files. Don't modify those files in any way, just copy them to TB folder on your device. If you already have Titanium Backup installed on your device, then there should be a folder on your sdcard called "Titanium Backup" or something like that.
-Now open TB. Tap on TDKR icon, you should have the Restore option. Choose Restore Data Only.
And enjoy the Game.

what did you do to get it to work?

downloaded the files, first i put the data files in sd/android/obb/(game`s data folder)
installed the apk
copied the titanium backup files (2files) into sd/Titanium Backup (if u dnt hav titanium back up, search here on TPB)
opened TB, clicked on the batman rises game file
clicked wipe data, then resotre data only

done  ;)

It depends on what you mean by, "do I need a rooted device to install this game?" If you want to install these titanium backup files to install the game, then yes as titanium requires root access. You may be able to find a cracked .apk with the SD files that would allow you to install and work without having root. It really depends on how the game was cracked. Some games work without root and some require root to be installed correctly. This game worked for me.

Sent from my rooted Samsung Galaxy S running Helly Bean ROM 4.1.1 on the Devil3 kernel.
